column5: These were taken from a recent trip we had.  I was literally one foot away from this brave seagull!    These trout (rainbows and brook trout) were in a pond at Scenic Caves. It was great watching them come up to take pellets.          Lots of frogs in that same pond       Pretty hard to capture a monarch in flight! (taken at Sauble Falls)   THE DEVIL!!! (Sauble Falls)   Fairly small run of chinooks at The Mill Dam in Owen Sound (I was surprised how many of them had lampreys attached)     The main point of the trip was to visit The Bruce Peninsula.... Beautiful. Absolutely stunning how clear and blue the water is and the amazing scenic shoreline.
most excellent !!! you have a good eye for photography  thanks for sharing this   the theme song from Jaws comes to mind looking at the fish
Excellent action shots of the fish.  Some folks will take dozens and dozens of pics, just to get that single 'good' shot.  Ya did quite well there.
Man you get Commodore Bushart's award for photography  Bushart
wow great shots, must be loving the new camera!
Absolutely astonishing photo shoots frozen-fire Like others said.... you have an amazing eye to capture wild life in their environment!!! Congratulations and thanks for sharing Leechman

Awesome pics generously proportioned  This past weekend, Victor was curled up in the fetal position and mumbling "when is my new camera coming" over and over again.  Perhaps when he sees this thread it will drive him even more insane

I finally got the tracking # which means they shipped it and it'll be here by today !!!!!!!!!! FINALLY.  Great pics Anthony, just wish that we can attach a piece of line/hook onto those pellets lol  I'm heading up to algonquin this coming weekend so hopefully I can bring back some nice pics.
Thanks guys  Victor, I hope you have a great trip with better weather than what we're currently seeing. Should be prime time for algonquin fall colours. Look forward to the pics
Nice pics!  I like the one where the trouts have their mouths open above the surface of the water.
awesome pics man. You must have a nice camera
Real amazing photos!  Thanks for putting these close up pictures up.
